title: Attempted shooting in Peliyagoda; No injuries
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A store owner in Pethiyagoda, Peliyagoda was targeted by two unknown gunmen on Tuesday (26) night, fortunately, no injuries were reported.
Police stated that the gunmen opened fire at their intended target, but failed to commit murder.
Peliyagoda Police are conducting further investigations to arrest the suspects.
Sainthamaruthu remains exhumed to extract DNA to determine Sarah Jasmine’s presence
